Package hippodrome

Interface ControlCentreInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ControlCentre, ControlCentreStub

    public interface ControlCentreInterface
    Interface of the place where the Spectators go to enjoy the race (at a Watching Stand) and the Broker controls the races and publishes its results.
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Hugo Fragata, Rui Lopes
